history.text: wow didn't know chris Columbus was director
Home alone was a classic comedy. MaCaulay Culkin did a great job of playing Kevin
I am not familiar with the director. However, he did a great job.
yes very good was a great comedy, feel sorry for the buglars marv  played by Daniel stern and harry played by joe pesci
Yes, the burglars had their hands full with all the elaborate traps set by Kevin in this movie.
kevin very good at booby traps to be a kid
I see that the document says critics did not fully like the movie. I am surprised by that fact.
yes , I figured it was a well liked movie I loved them
One critic said the booby traps were not plausible for an 8 year old to make.
I thought the movie did a good job of making it seem realistic for a kid left home for days alone.
yes it was,
makes you think very carefully not to wish for things you really don't want to happen

Yes, that is true. 
How did the one critic consider it adult bashing?
guess how  the robbers was beat by a kid? not sure thought it was a good family funny movie
I thought the script was a classic. A little boy left home alone for days while his family flies to Paris during Christmas break.
Also, I thought these people must be wealthy, they could afford to fly all of those people to Paris for Christmas. ha ha ha
i know right, lol
And another thing, how do you leave behind a kid. I always count everyone when we do group trips or activities.
i can feel how kate felt after realizing mid flight kevin wasn't with them, i would feel so bad
i would never leave my kids id leave othr items before my kids that the first thing i always make sure is took care of and is where they need to be
Me too.
also how you go on trip with all the family that would be hetic to me lol to many to keep up with
Yes, it is very hectic. I have been on a family trip with 8  people and it is hard to please everyone.
i also would be to scared to travel with strangers but guess a mother will do what she has to for her kids
I like the part in the movie where Kate travels with the Polka band trying to get back to Paris.

yes but bet very annoying ride though lol ,
wonder how kevin knew to start booby traping , was it just instint to be prepared?
thought it was sweet how he finally realized that marley wasn't a bad guy was a nice person

Kevin seem like a kid who played tricks on people. It probably was instinctive. Also, yes It would have been a little annoying to travel with the polka band, but a mom will do anything to get to her kids.
Yes, Kevin relationship with Marley was adorable.
bet kevin was scared buzz was going get him for destroying his room lol
best part is when mom and kevin finally got back together.
I think everyone was so happy to see Kevin that it did not matter. Yes,
